summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6007 for the improvement of Ruffner Street from 40th Avenue West to Arapahoe Place; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80802, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
